resources.string: What better way to catch up with what\'s happening in your loved ones\' lives than to have it over scrumptious authentic Chinese cuisine.
Time for a classic game of Mahjong with a tinge of competitive spirit.
Shopping - a retail therapy taken when life demands a happiness boost.
Have a delightful conversation with your loved ones over tea, and enjoy each others\' company.
Why practice yoga when you can learn the ancient art of Tai chi from your Mom?
Craving for some home-cooked meal filled with love? How about preparing it yourself and unleash the chef inside you.
